001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
009import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012
013public class RunModuleWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
014
015  private final Command<?> command;
016
017  public RunModuleWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space, Command<?> command) {
018    super(bach, project, space);
019    this.command = command;
020  }
021
022  protected ModuleFinder computeRuntimeModuleFinder() {
023    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
024    paths.add(computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space));
025    paths.addAll(computeModulePathsOption().values());
026    return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
027  }
028
029  protected ToolCall computeToolCall() {
030    var finder = computeRuntimeModuleFinder();
031    return ToolCall.module(finder, command);
032  }
033
034  protected void visitToolRun(ToolRun run) {
035    bach.printer().print(run);
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  public void run() {
040    var call = computeToolCall();
041    var run = bach.run(call);
042    visitToolRun(run);
043  }
044}
